Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: International Editor: Journal of Natural Resources Policy Research

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Co-organizer: International Workshop on “Fairness and the Commons: Socio-economic Strategies and Resource Dynamics”, Fondazione Eni Enrico Mattei
Public Goods and International Governance. Invited lecture, Southeast Asia Regional Training Workshop, Taiwan
Participation to FEEM Workshop ’Climate Change and Public Goods’, Venice. Contribution: Tipping Climate Cooperation: Theory and Experiments.
Luring Others Into Climate Action. Thematic Session Presentation at the World Congress of Environmental Economists, Istanbul
Bargaining in Multilateral Negotiations. Thematic Session Presentation at the Royal Economic Society conference
Organizer: International Workshop on “Bottom-up evolution of cooperation: linking local and global environmental commons”, Grantham Research Institute, LSE

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: F1000Prime Article Recommendations 2012 Best poster award, Princeton Research Symposium (Princeton University) 2008 Special Project Grant Scheme 2009

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione in vari gruppi internazionali di ricerca, tra cui: SESYNC, Annapolis (U.S.A., 2014-15); Stockholm Resilience Centre (2014); Asko Meetins (2015)

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Enel Foundation (Grant 1-RGI-U885): 'Identifying drivers of cooperation with surveys and laboratory investigations'
